nodes.bodyText: In order to remove the null/empty functions, I feel we can stop import from Filesystem.java

ozone/hadoop-ozone/ozone-manager/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/ozone/protocolPB/OzoneManagerProtocolServerSideTranslatorPB.java
    
    
         Line 119
      in
      b0d54d4
    
    
    
    

        
          
           public OMResponse submitRequest(RpcController controller,

i am calling the same method here i.e
 public OMResponse submitRequest(RpcController controller, OMRequest request) throws ServiceException {. om.getOmServerProtocol() returns OzoneManagerProtocolServerSideTranslatorPB object.
this code is similar between listStatus and getFileStatus, lets have a common function to avoid duplication of code
debug logging, please convert to trace.
Lets also add that ${result} also has Trash in the name ?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -92,10 +92,16 @@ Touch file
     ${result} =    Execute               ozone sh key list ${VOLUME}/${BUCKET} | jq -r '.name'
                    Should contain        ${result}       TOUCHFILE-${SCHEME}.txt
 
+Delete file with Trash
+                   Execute               ozone fs -touch ${DEEP_URL}/testFile.txt
+    ${result} =    Execute               ozone fs -rm ${DEEP_URL}/testFile.txt
+                   Should contain        ${result}     testFile.txt

nodes.bodyText: Also lets check if the file is actually present in the path

nodes.bodyText: Lets also add a function to convert OzoneFileStatus to FileStatus ?
why are we deleting only the first entry ? and ignoring the rest of the entries here ?
the keys in the keyset belong to the same volume and bucket.hence just reading the volume and bucket from the first entry. we are not ignoring other entries. all entries are deleted .
Lets have a helper function to convert src,dst to OzoneManagerProtocolProtos.RenameKeyRequest
